original_title: Ano ang Kulay ng Mukha ng Diyos?
overview: A street hustler falls in love with a bar girl. They get married, but separate when the guy gets meted a death sentence after gunning down a rich customer of the bar in a fit of jealousy. The bar girl bears the hustler's child who becomes eventually blind.
tagline: A story of fate set to the music of the heart of a child
title: Ano ang Kulay ng Mukha ng Diyos?
